title: Drawing, Birth of Alexander the Great; Battle of Alexander and Darius; Triumph of Alexander
title_raw: Birth of Alexander the Great; Battle of Alexander and Darius; Triumph of Alexander
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen: 1 nascita di Alessandro; 2 sacrificio fatto  alli dei prima della guerra da Alessandro; 3 bataglia di Alessa con Dario; 4 Trionfo d' Alessandro in Babilogna.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Birth of Alexander the Great; Battle of Alexander and Darius; Triumph of Alexander. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1360
